proper noun.description: An industrial city in northeastern England, a port on the Tyne River; population 170,200 (est. 2009). Full name Newcastle upon Tyne.
An industrial town in Staffordshire, in England, just southwest of Stoke-on-Trent; population 77,500 (est. 2009). Full name Newcastle-under-Lyme.
An industrial port on the southeastern coast of Australia, in New South Wales; population 152,659 (2008).
